thread.title: The PRCA Chisholm Trail Prairie Circuit Rodeo Finals Come to Duncan, the Heart of the Chisholm Trail
thread.title_full: The PRCA Chisholm Trail Prairie Circuit Rodeo Finals Come to Duncan, the Heart of the Chisholm Trail

author: Loisdawn Jones
title: The PRCA Chisholm Trail Prairie Circuit Rodeo Finals Come to Duncan, the Heart of the Chisholm Trail
text:
It is almost PRO rodeo time in the heart of the Chisholm Trail, Duncan, OK. Announcer Justin McKee will call all the breathtaking, spine tingling action and top contractors will bring the best of their livestock to make it a memorable finals. On October 15-17th, top contenders from OK, KS and NE will be ready to "cowboy up" as they compete for the privilege of heading to Las Vegas to compete in the National Finals Rodeo. For many, the Chisholm Trail PRCA Prairie Circuit Rodeo Finals held at the Stephens County Fair and Expo Center in Duncan, OK is the "make it or break it" moment.
PRCA rodeo action starts at 7:30 pm nightly. Vendors will be in and around the arena grounds. Tickets may be purchased at Crutchers Western Wear in Duncan or Lawton, OK, online at http://www.prairiecircuitfinalsrodeo.com or at the gate. Advance tickets are $12 Adult, $8 Ages 4-12, 3 and Under Free. At the Door are $15 Adult, $10 Ages 4-12, 3 and Under Free. Tough Enough to Wear Pink Night on Friday Night October 16th!
For more information, contact The Duncan Convention and Visitors Bureau at 1-800-782-7167 or tourism(at)simmonscenter.com
